item.title: The Onion buys Alex Jones' Infowars at bankruptcy auction
item.description: Satirical publication The Onion, with the support of Sandy Hook families, purchased the bankrupt site of conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

item.title: Famed Russian chef and Putin critic found dead in Belgrade
item.description: After Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Alexei Zimin posted anti-war messages and stopped his cooking show on a pro-Kremlin television station.
